mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT cre.title, cre.content_intro, cre.reg_date, cre.tag, cre.AGE_RATE, cre.DON_REG, cre.GAME_LAUNCH, cre.DON_ATTAINMENT, cre.CONTENT_ID, cre.USERID, cre.PLATFORM, cre.LANGUAGES, cre.media2, cre.MONEY_TEMP, countdone.cnt donecnt FROM teamacreatercontent cre, teamadonation doti, (SELECT COUNT(donation) cnt FROM TEAMADONATION) countdone WHERE cre.content_id = doti.content_id AND cre.content_id = #{content_id}

SELECT title, age_rate, don_reg, platform, media2, content_id, genre_id, don_attainment, money_temp, hit FROM ( SELECT /*+INDEX_DESC(teamacreatercontent xpkteamacreatercontent */ rownum rn, title, content_intro, reg_date, highlight, tag, age_rate, don_reg, game_launch, don_attainment, userid, platform, languages, media1, media2, media3, media4, content_id, genre_id, money_temp, hit, like_cnt FROM teamacreatercontent WHERE don_reg - sysdate > 0 ) WHERE don_reg - sysdate > 0 ORDER BY 4 DESC

SELECT funding.donation as donation
FROM ( SELECT /*+index(teamacreatercontent xpkteamacreatercontent */ rownum rn, title, content_intro, reg_date, highlight, tag, age_rate, don_reg, game_launch, don_attainment, userid, platform, languages, media1, media2, media3, media4, content_id, genre_id, hit, like_cnt FROM teamacreatercontent
) il, (SELECT c.content_id AS content_id, sum(get_donation) AS donation FROM (SELECT don.content_id, sum(donation) AS get_donation FROM teamadonation don GROUP BY don.content_id )cre, teamacreatercontent c WHERE c.content_id = cre.content_id GROUP BY c.content_id ) funding
GROUP BY funding.donation
